doc.repnme: Transcript of special meeting of Executive Directors, held on Thursday, October 1, 1964 : India - Report to the President of the IBRD and IDA on India's economic development effort
doc.abstracts: This partial transcript, from the session of the Executive Directors held on Thursday, October 1, 1964, covers only a series of economic studies on India. A description is given of the outside expert economists who will join Bank staffers in a task force to conduct the studies. The studies will consist of (a) a set of inquiries of particular development sectors judged to be of critical importance to the Indian economy; and (b) a comprehensive assessment of the existing effort to accelerate the growth of the Indian economy.
